Package com.viaoa.jfc.editor.html.control

Controllers for OAHTMLTextPane style editor.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ImageHandlerInterface Used by OAHTMLTextPane to manage images.
 

Class Summary
BlockController Controller for BlockDialog, used to edit a paragraph (block) attributes.
Class2ImageHandler Used by OAHTMLTextPane to use OAObjects to store images in an OAObject.
FileImageHandler Used by OAHTMLTextPane for manage file images.
Hub2ImageHandler Used by OAHTMLTextPane to use OAObjects to store images.
InsertController Controller for InsertDialog, which allows inserting html & attributes.
OAHTMLTextPaneController Expands on OATextController to create an HTML word processor.
 

Package com.viaoa.jfc.editor.html.control Description

Controllers for OAHTMLTextPane style editor.
